DOC.brief_summary: Estimate the effect of oral ketoconazole administration (400 mg once daily over 3 days) on the pharmacokinetics (process by which the drug is absorbed, distributed, metabolized, and eliminated by the body) of single 10 mg dose of tasocitinib (CP-690,550) in normal healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Effect Of Ketoconazole On The Pharmacokinetics Of Tasocitinib (CP-690,550) In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female (nonchildbearing potential) subjects between the ages of 18 and 55 years Clinically significant disease Recent history of serious infection
